      • sendCommands

        int sendCommands​(java.util.List<CommandMessage> commands,
                 boolean undo)
        Sends received commands to User Interface.
        Parameters:
        commands - is the list of commands
        undo - tells if undo command has to be added to the possible choices
        Returns:
        the user's answer
